  • Uses of Ray in elements

    Methods in elements that return Ray 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    Ray Camera.constructRayThroughPixel​(int nX, int nY, int j, int i, double screenDistance, double screenWidth, double screenHeight)
    gets view plane parameters and indexes of a pixel and generates a Ray from the camera through that pixel.

    Methods in geometries that return Ray 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    Ray Cylinder.get_axisRay()

    Methods in geometries with parameters of type Ray 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    java.util.List<Intersectable.GeoPoint> Cylinder.findIntersections​(Ray ray, double maxDistance)  
    java.util.List<Intersectable.GeoPoint> Geometries.findIntersections​(Ray ray, double maxDistance)  
    default java.util.List<Intersectable.GeoPoint> Intersectable.findIntersections​(Ray ray)
    calculates all intersections between a Ray and a intersectable objects from beginning of the ray all a long.
    java.util.List<Intersectable.GeoPoint> Intersectable.findIntersections​(Ray ray, double maxDistance)
    calculates all intersections between a Ray and a intersectable objects from beginning of the ray until a given distance.
    java.util.List<Intersectable.GeoPoint> Plane.findIntersections​(Ray ray, double maxDistance)  
    java.util.List<Intersectable.GeoPoint> Polygon.findIntersections​(Ray ray, double maxDistance)  
    java.util.List<Intersectable.GeoPoint> Sphere.findIntersections​(Ray ray, double maxDistance)  
    java.util.List<Intersectable.GeoPoint> Triangle.findIntersections​(Ray ray, double maxDistance)

    Constructor Description

    Tube constructor receiving Tube radius value and the Tube height.
    Tube​(Color emission, double radius, Ray ray, float height)

    Tube​(Material material, Color emission, double radius, Ray ray, float height)
    Tube constructor receiving Tube radius value and the Tube height emission light and material.

  • Uses of Ray in renderer

    Methods in renderer that return Ray 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    private Ray Render.constructReflectedRay​(Point3D point, Ray inRay, Vector n)
    constructs the ray of reflected light.
    private Ray Render.constructRefractedRay​(Point3D point, Ray inRay, Vector n)
    constructs the ray of refracted light.
    Methods in renderer with parameters of type Ray 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    private Color Render.calcColor​(Intersectable.GeoPoint geoPoint, Ray inRay)
    calculates the color of a given geoPoint taking in count all light sources in the scene and all reflection and transparency colors.
    private Color Render.calcColor​(Intersectable.GeoPoint geoPoint, Ray inRay, int level, double k)
    calculates the color of a given geoPoint taking in count all light sources in the scene and all reflection and transparency colors.
    private Ray Render.constructReflectedRay​(Point3D point, Ray inRay, Vector n)
    constructs the ray of reflected light.
    private Ray Render.constructRefractedRay​(Point3D point, Ray inRay, Vector n)
    constructs the ray of refracted light.
    private Intersectable.GeoPoint Render.findClosestIntersection​(Ray ray)
    finds the closest intersection point between a ray and the geometries in the scene.
